Server Code¶

The server code is in python making use of the django framework. There are application modules to handle the details of the HTTP requests, and project modules to handle the django settings.

Directory structure¶

The source code is arranged according to django’s default directory structure, intermingled with the client sources, like so:

djangoOligo
   app
   proj

app : files specific to the application.

proj : files for managing the application through django.

Source Code¶

  • Application modules
    • admin.py
    • forms.py
    • models.py
    • tests.py
    • urls.py
    • views.py
  • Project modules
    • settings.py
    • wsgi.py
    • urls.py
